title: How to use Braun Face Extra Sensitive Sponge | Becca Rose | Braun
description: Becca Rose has teamed up with Braun to talk about the Braun Face For Facial Epilation, which now has 3 interchangable heads which allow you to tailor your skincare routine to all of your beauty needs. Here she demonstrates the extra sensitive brush which

asset.author: Braun
asset.hookText:
Becca Rose has teamed up with Braun to talk about the Braun Face For Facial Epilation, which now has 3 interchangable heads which allow you to tailor your skincare routine to all of your beauty needs. Here she demonstrates the extra sensitive brush which is ideal for dry and sensitive skin. The bristles are soft and dense with rounded edges providing an extra gentle cleansing treatment, leaving your skin with a flawless glow. 
Using the brush is really simple; first moisten it, then apply your cleanser onto the bristles; Becca Rose likes to use a cleansing milk with hers. After this moisten your face and guide the brush with gentle pressure and circular motions for about a minute. Once you have finished, rinse the brush and your skin, then go onto the next step of your beauty routine!

So if you are looking for gentle cleansing for sensitive skin then the sensitive Braun brush head is for you. Break free from impurities with the Braun Face. To learn more about the Braun products that Becca Rose has recommended for getting your skin moisturised and glowing, check out http://www.braun.com/global/female-grooming/braun-face.html and visit http://www.braun.com/global for more beauty and lifestyle products that make a difference!
